records.context_note: Migrants (approx. 130) arrived in 3 boats, screened at Text Removed - Reporting Tools premises due to closed hotspot. An attempt to transport them to the camp failed because a group of Africans started a fire. Another large group of migrants descended from the camp to Vathy town to protest bad living conditions at the reception centre, heading towards Text Removed - Reporting Tools premises for registration, escorted by Text Removed - Reporting Tools. The situation in Samos Island hotspot was deteriorating with potential conflicts. By 19:00 LT in Vathy and 20:00 LT in the Samos hotspot, the situation returned to normal. Migrants were transported to the hotspot, and fingerprinting activities began.
records.evidence_quote: Currently Text Removed - Reporting Tools is screening the migrants who arrived in 3 boats (approx. 130 migrants) from the previous days in the premises of Text Removed - Reporting Tools due to closed hotspot. After the migrants from 1st boat were fully screened, Text Removed - Reporting Tools tried to transport them to the camp, but unfortunately they had to return because a group of Africans started fire once again when they saw the transportation van.
